price: Saa Da no yɛmmisa onipa anaa Jinn biara bͻne ho asεm.
arabic: فَيَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّا يُسۡـَٔلُ عَن ذَنۢبِهِۦٓ إِنسٞ وَلَا جَآنّٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fayawma-idhin lā yus'alu ʿan dhanbihi insun walā jānnun
